WorkItem.ClosedComment: Yep, finally got some time to release 1.0.6
WorkItem.Description:
I see 1.0.5 is from July 2013. The most recent changeset is 107668 on Mar 29, 2014.

Is it time for a new release? 1.0.6 perhaps? I'd love to be able to get latest using NuGet, for example: 

```
<package id="ModernUI.WPF" version="1.0.6" targetFramework="net452" />
```

Unless there is a way to get the latest changeset using NuGet?
